context_bundle.content:
Hexagonal (Ports & Adapters) architecture.

Core Concept:
Application core is isolated from external concerns through ports (interfaces) and adapters (implementations).

Structure:
- Domain: Business logic, entities
- Ports: Interfaces for external interaction
- Adapters: Implementations (DB, API, UI)

Benefits:
- Testable core (mock adapters)
- Swappable infrastructure
- Clear boundaries

Example Ports:
- UserRepository (persistence)
- PaymentGateway (external service)
- NotificationSender (outbound)

Example Adapters:
- PostgresUserRepository
- StripePaymentGateway
- SendGridNotificationSender
